subject: RE: Projects Website Changes
preview: Hi Danielle, Sure, confirming we have made the changes and removed the steps etc. https://advantagestyling.com.au/advantage-projects/ Let me know if you would like any further changes.

full_threads.body:
Hi Danielle, 

Sure, confirming we have made the changes and removed the steps etc. 
https://advantagestyling.com.au/advantage-projects/

Let me know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Glen Tenorio

you can remove the heading step 1 step 2 etc.

Section 2 - Sydney’s leading home makeover specialist

- Same Before & After images in carousel format
Section 3- Dedicated Project management
Update dot points to mimic homepage circles and text - See attached folder – Project Management with a selection of images – please choose what best fits in the circles
Save Time – Your Professional project manager will manage the process start to finish. We have the experience to conduct all works in timely manner to ensure your marketing campaign deadlines are achieved!
Stress & Hassle Free – We take care of it all! Liaising with trades and services, attending onsite visits, quality checks and the hand over process.
Priced Competitively – We obtain multiple quotes from our panel of gold standard trades and services.
Pay Later – We understand the cost of preparing your home for market can add up, and therefore we have partnered with various pay later solutions to help with the costs.
